title: In case of plot not abutting on a public means of access like street / roads etc
clause_text: In case of plot not abutting on a public means of access like street / roads etc., the plot shall have access from spaces directly connected from the street by a hard surface approach as given below :- The width of such access ways in non-congested areas shall be as follows :-
section: Authorities to Supply Complete Information about Restrictions to the Authority

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
